mapper.select: select count(*) from lead a, prospect b where a.pros_id = b.pros_id

select lead_id , reg_chnl_nm , con_type_nm , pros_nm , cell_ph_no , cell_ph_tno , cell_ph_pno , eml_id , eml_domain , last_upd
from ( select rownum as rn , x.lead_id , x.reg_chnl_nm , x.con_type_nm , x.pros_nm , x.cell_ph_no , x.cell_ph_tno , x.cell_ph_pno , x.eml_id , x.eml_domain , x.last_upd
from (select a.lead_id , c.code_nm as reg_chnl_nm , d.code_nm as con_type_nm , b.pros_nm , b.cell_ph_no , b.cell_ph_tno , b.cell_ph_pno , b.eml_id , b.eml_domain , a.last_upd
from lead a, prospect b, code c, code d where a.pros_id = b.pros_id and a.reg_chnl_cd = c.code and a.con_type_cd = d.code
order by a.last_upd desc, b.pros_nm ) x where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}

select a.lead_id as lead_id , b.pros_id as pros_id , a.reg_chnl_cd as reg_chnl_nm , a.con_type_cd as con_type_nm , b.pros_nm as pros_nm , b.cell_ph_no as cell_ph_no , b.cell_ph_tno as cell_ph_tno , b.cell_ph_pno as cell_ph_pno , b.eml_id as eml_id , b.eml_domain as eml_domain , a.last_upd as last_upd , a.spec_desc as spec_desc
from lead a, prospect b where a.pros_id = b.pros_id and lead_id = #{lead_id}
mapper.insert: insert into lead(lead_id, del_yn, created_by, created, last_upd_by, last_upd, reg_chnl_cd, con_type_cd, spec_desc, pros_id) values(seq_lead.nextval, 'n', #{created_by}, sysdate, #{last_upd_by}, sysdate, #{reg_chnl_cd}, #{con_type_cd}, #{spec_desc}, #{prospectVO.pros_id})
mapper.update: update lead set reg_chnl_cd = #{reg_chnl_cd}, con_type_cd = #{con_type_cd}, spec_desc = #{spec_desc}, last_upd_by = #{last_upd_by}, last_upd = sysdate where lead_id = #{lead_id}
